thread.title: Less than your usual W, but hey .. it's NYC
thread.title_full: Less than your usual W, but hey .. it's NYC - Review of W New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jessica S
title: Less than your usual W, but hey .. it's NYC
text: Let me start by saying. I have been to the city many times and have not stayed here again but would give it a second try at some point. Typical NYC room xs ... bathroom tiny. Clean yes ! Cute ... yes ... I did not get any stunning views of the city faced another building (again typical). On the other hand nice lobby and great location in the city. Lot's of movement and restaurants in the area. Easy access to public transportation. Again not that bad but not as great as other W I've stayed in other cities.
